text: @NYGovCuomo @NYGovCuomo quote "be an essential worker & you're NOT going to  kill anyone"but then you refuse to open the economy because it "jeopardizes public health"? Are "nonessential" workers #WuhanVirus carriers? YOU all are HYPOCRITES @ChrisCuomo ,@CNN, @Msnbc @MikeBloomberg.
